name: Vertex Protocol
description: Vertex Protocol plans to decentralize governance and provide additional utility via the release of a governance token, VRTX. The main function of VRTX will be to facilitate effective decentralized participation in Vertex while also creating xVRTX, a liquid staking token, and voVRTX, the protocolâ€™s untransferable voting token. Both are essential in rewarding different levels of commitment to the protocol and rewarding stakeholders at various levels of governance and participation.
